column4: News;Phnom Penh:------  A cat-fight broke out on Thursday
column11: an 18 year old Karaoke worker slashed Sam Sovanmelea
column13: across the nose to the cheek with a razor blade.------Before the incident
column16: when the other girl came in and immediately quarreled over Facebook dissing. ------Slaps were thrown and hair was pulled
column17: until a razor came out and a face got cut. Police intervened and arrested the girls and took then to Tonle Bassac cop shop.------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/262413
